description.lang: eZLO hub is a Z-Wave (soon also to have Bluetooth, BLE Mesh and WiFi protocols) central static controller. It can be paired with any Z-Wave network and run with Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers. All Z-Wave devices within the network range act as Z-Wave repeaters (regardless of brand) to deliver maximum network reliability. eZLO Smart Home hub lets you adjust your thermostat, lock your door, and dim your lights, and you can turn it on and off while youre on a vacation.You can also easily control the eZLO Smart Home hub from your laptop, tablet and other mobile devices.
